name: smartalloc/wordpress-plugin
description: Event-driven student support allocation with Gravity Forms + Exporter

scripts.ci: composer lint && composer test:security && composer test
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && VERSION=$(php -r "include 'smart-alloc.php'; echo SMARTALLOC_VERSION;") && rsync -a . dist/smartalloc --exclude 'tests' --exclude 'stubs' --exclude 'docs' --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude '.github' --exclude 'dist' && cd dist && zip -r smartalloc-v$VERSION.zip smartalloc && rm -rf smartalloc
scripts.dist: composer lint && composer test:security && composer test && composer build
